snippet: Mr. Schintzius, a former University of Florida basketball star, was Florida’s sixth-highest scorer with 1,624 points, and also played eight seasons in the N.B.A., including with the New Jersey Nets.
abstract: Dwayne Schintzius, a former University of Florida basketball star who also played eight seasons in the NBA, dies at age 43.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Schintzius, a former University of Florida basketball star, was Florida’s sixth-highest scorer with 1,624 points, and also played eight seasons in the N.B.A., including with the New Jersey Nets.

headline.main: Dwayne Schintzius, N.B.A. Center, Dies at 43
